
```{r}
#| label: single-layer-gridtown
#| warning: false
set.seed(6805)
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(tidyterra)
gridtown <- terra::rast(
  nrows = 4, ncols = 4,
  xmin = 0, xmax = 4, ymin = 0, ymax = 4,
  vals = sample(1:16)
)
plot(gridtown)
text(
  gridtown,
  halo=TRUE, hc="black", col="white", hw=0.2
)
```

```{r}
#| label: gridtown-with-ggplot
gridtown |> ggplot() +
  geom_spatraster(data=gridtown) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  theme_classic()
```
